snippet: Nokia shareholders overwhelmingly approved the acquisition of the ailing French telecom Alcatel-Lucent, removing one of the last hurdles to a $16.5 billion deal.
abstract: Nokia shareholders approve acquisition of Alcatel-Lucent, getting rid of one of final impediemtns to 15.6 billion euro, or $16.5 billion, deal.
lead_paragraph: Nokia shareholders overwhelmingly approved the acquisition of the ailing French telecom Alcatel-Lucent, removing one of the last hurdles to a $16.5 billion deal.

headline.main: Nokia Shareholders Back Deal to Buy Ailing Alcatel-Lucent
headline.print_headline: Nokia Shareholders Back Deal to Buy Ailing French Telecom
